mapper.insert: insert into t_shopping_car_table ( is_delete, create_name, create_time, version, user_id, cnt, goods_id, shopping_car_id, price )values ( 0, #{createName}, now(), 0, #{userCode}, #{cnt}, #{goodsId}, #{shoppingCartCode}, #{price} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.goods_name goodsName, b.good_id goodsId, b.price goodsPrice, a.cnt cartGoodsCount, b.picture goodsImagePath, a.shopping_car_id shopCartId FROM t_shopping_car_table a, t_goods_table b WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND a.user_id = #{userCode} AND a.goods_id = b.good_id
mapper.update: update t_shopping_car_table set version=version+1, cnt=#{cnt}, change_name=#{changeName}, change_time=now() where shopping_car_id=#{shoppingCartCode}
